          <title>
            <string language="en">Formation of poly(butylene terephthalate)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anordnung des poly(butylene Terephthalats)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Formation de téréphtalate de poly(butylene)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formação do terephthalate do poly(butylene)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione del tereftalato del poly(butylene)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχηματισμός του τερεφθαλικού poly(butylene)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Formación del terephthalate del poly(butylene)</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This equation shows the reaction, using displayed formulae, of two monomers to form poly(butylene terephthalate). This polymer is used in making external mirror housings of some vehicles.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">equation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">housings</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mirror</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">monomers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">poly(butylene terephthalate)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">polymers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vehicles</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Gleichung zeigt die Reaktion mit angezeigten
Formeln, von zwei Monomeren, poly(butylene Terephthalat zu bilden). 
Dieses Polymer-Plastik wird benutzt, wenn man externe 
Spiegelgehäuse einiger Träger bildet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette équation montre la réaction, en utilisant 
des formules affichées, de deux monomères pour former le 
téréphtalate de poly(butylene). Ce polymère est utilisé dans
la fabrication des logements externes de miroir de quelques 
véhicules.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta equação mostra a reação, usando fórmulas
indicadas, de dois monomers dar forma ao terephthalate do 
poly(butylene). Este polímero é usado em fazer as carcaças 
externas do espelho de alguns veículos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa equazione mostra la reazione, usando le 
formule visualizzate, di due monomeri per formare il tereftalato del 
poly(butylene). Questo polimero è usato nel fare le carcasse 
esterne dello specchio di alcuni veicoli.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η εξίσωση εμφανίζει την αντίδραση, 
χρησιμοποιώντας τους επιδειχθέντες τύπους, δύο μονομερών για να 
διαμορφώσει poly(butylene το τερεφθαλικό). Αυτό το 
πολυμερές σώμα χρησιμοποιείται στην παραγωγή των εξωτερικών 
κατοικιών καθρεφτών μερικών οχημάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ecuación muestra la reacción, usando 
fórmulas visualizados, de dos monomers para formar el terephthalate 
del poly(butylene). Este polímero se utiliza en la fabricación
de las cubiertas externas del espejo de algunos vehículos.</string>
          </description>
